casename: Hong Pian Tee v Les Placements Germain Gauthier Inc
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Tan Lee Meng J; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Manjit Singh and Sree Govind Menon (Manjit & Partners) for the Appellant; Siva Murugaiyan and Parveen Kaur Nagpal (Colin Ng & Partners) for the Respondents
tags-parsed: Conflict of Laws/Foreign judgments/Enforcement/Allegation that foreign judgment obtained by fraud/Principles governing foreign judgments/Approach of local court/Whether foreign judgment challengeable on ground of fraud where allegation of fraud already adjudicated upon by foreign court/Whether fresh evidence of fraud required/Whether fresh evidence of fraud exists/Whether evidence makes a difference to verdict admitted in foreign court
